mapper.select: SELECT b.num, b.category, b.title, b.body, b.writer, b.reg_date , u.id, u.latitude, u.longitude, u.address, u.signup_date, u.email, u.name FROM board b JOIN user u ON b.writer = u.id ORDER BY reg_date DESC
SELECT num, category, title, body, writer, reg_date regDate FROM board WHERE num = #{value}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board(category, title, body, writer) VALUES(#{category},#{title}, #{body}, #{writer})
mapper.select: SELECT cnum, bnum, writer, body, reg_date regDate FROM comment WHERE bnum = #{value} ORDER BY reg_date ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment(bnum, writer, body) VALUES(#{bnum}, #{writer}, #{body})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM partyMember WHERE id = #{id} and pnum = #{pnum}
mapper.select: SELECT m.pnum, m.id, p.bnum, p.max, p.pnum, m.pmnum FROM party p JOIN partyMember m ON p.pnum = m.pnum WHERE p.bnum = #{value};
